revised_title: Mercury Chain and Sheet Compounds: Structure and Properties
tldr: This article discusses the preparation and structure of chain and sheet mercury compounds, which have unique electrical and magnetic properties. The author describes the preparation of polymercury cations and the formation of insoluble golden metallic compounds. The structures of these compounds are analyzed, revealing non-stoichiometric and stoichiometric properties. The transformation of chain and layer compounds is also discussed, highlighting their remarkable electronic and structural properties.
